response.overview: The key character of the film will first be Zita Lantos, who will talk about her work, why she helps children, what drove her to come here, how her husband copes with her travelling, what her sons think about it, what children she helps and here Theodora comes into the picture, what illness she has. What kind of therapy she has to go through, what kind of difficulties she has to deal with on a daily basis, and from here on the two of them become the key characters in the film. It will be through their relationship that we will see the trust between them, how Theodora has developed a bond of complete trust with Zita, how Theodora encourages Zita, how Zita's children have accepted her and how Theodora's recovery process will be shown.
response.title: Wheelchair
